mapper.select:
SELECT
from jl_install where 1=1 and azd01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.azd01},'%') and khmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.khmc},'%') and lxdz like CONCAT('%',#{param.lxdz},'%') and lxdh like CONCAT('%',#{param.lxdh},'%') and qtdh like CONCAT('%',#{param.qtdh},'%') and spfl01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.spfl01},'%') and spflmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.spflmc},'%') and ppb01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.ppb01},'%') and ppbmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.ppbmc},'%') and spbm like CONCAT('%',#{param.spbm},'%') and spmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.spmc},'%') and dzbm01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.dzbm01},'%') and bmmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.bmmc},'%') and yysj like CONCAT('%',#{param.yysj},'%') and pwdsj like CONCAT('%',#{param.pwdsj},'%') and hzrq like CONCAT('%',#{param.hzrq},'%') and azwd01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.azwd01},'%') and wdmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.wdmc},'%') and gsxx01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.gsxx01},'%') and gsmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.gsmc},'%') and thdh like CONCAT('%',#{param.thdh},'%') and wbGsxx01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.wb_gsxx01},'%') and wbGsmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.wb_gsmc},'%') and sjly like CONCAT('%',#{param.sjly},'%') and njtm like CONCAT('%',#{param.njtm},'%') and wjtm like CONCAT('%',#{param.wjtm},'%')
